root.name: bezierVertex()
root.description: Specifies vertex coordinates for Bezier curves. This function must be used between beginShape() and endShape(). These curves are defined by a series of anchor and control points. Bezier curves were developed by French engineer Pierre Bezier.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: The x-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: The y-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: The z-coordinate of the vertex, either a float or int
